literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

literally: (object of) laughter; hence: = a person or group who has to endure lack of respect from others, often accompanied by laughter

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
linker denoting a habitual circumstantial relationship between two events
literally: to shake (one's head) = action by which humans turn their head from one side to the other ► to express scorn and derision
= action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

= causative action by which birds build a nest (קֵן) ◄ with the help of twigs, straw, grass and other materials, ► as a place where they can lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security
= opening of a well, cave, or gorge
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans
= state in which humans have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone utters words that are considered arrogant and foolish, for which one ought to be ashamed

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= action by which humans utter a high pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= town, also known as Kir Hareseth (קִיר חֲרֶשֶׂת) ◄ located in Moab (מֹואָב)

Node.gloss: to produce a sound|to growl|to mutter|to moan
Node.definition: = action by which living creatures produce inarticulate sounds
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= town; ◄ located in Gilead (גִּלְעָד) territory of Gad (גָּד) ► former Amorite (אֱמֹרִי) territory; assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) later occupied by Moab (מֹואָב)

Node.gloss: to cry|to weep|to lament|to mourn|to bewail
Node.definition: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= village, also known as Sebam (שְׂבָם) ◄ territory of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן)

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them
literally: to touch; hence: = process or action by which humans or substances arrive at a certain location
= various kinds of fruit that ripen in the summer; ► important food source
= pattern of actions by which humans harvest the grapes that have matured and are ready for picking

Node.gloss: to ravage|to devastate|to lay waster|to plunder
Node.definition: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are killed or severely wounded by enemies
= action by which someone brings an event to an end
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= land that is suitable for agriculture ◄ as a result of fertility and sufficient rain

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= a basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a trough or vat; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

= action by which someone move their feet with force on a surface or object, usually in a repetitive way ► which causes an effect on the surface or object whereupon it happens; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= action by which humans utter loud expressions of joy
= action by which humans utter loud expressions of joy
= action by which humans utter loud expressions of joy
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד) ► former residence of Sihon (סִיחֹון) king of Amorites (אֱמֹרִי) (who had captured it from Moab (מֹואָב) assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) later occupied by Moab
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= town; ◄ territory of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= town; ◄ territory of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן) ► assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) later occupied by Moab (מֹואָב)
= town; ◄ in the south of Jericho (יְרִחֹו) Valley; on south bank of Wadi Zered in Edomite (אֲדֹמִי) territory
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= town; ◄ located in Moab (מֹואָב)
= town; ◄ located in Moab (מֹואָב)

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= body of water, ◄ located in Moab (מֹואָב)
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up
= place of worship, often situated in an elevated location, but not necessarily so
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= a high pitched wind instrument consisting of a tube with holes along it, ◄ usually made of wood
= action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a high pitched wind instrument consisting of a tube with holes along it, ◄ usually made of wood
= action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea
literally: what remains, or is left over; hence: = possessions that one has in surplus over the possession one needs in order to live
literally: to make (possessions); hence: = action by which humans obtain possessions

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= a hairless patch on the head of an animal or human being in a location where hair normally grows; ≈ this can be a natural phenomenon, as on the head of a vulture, but it can also be created by shaving the head as a sign of mourning
= a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a mature man’s face, ≈ the absence of which is regarded as shameful
= causative action by which humans cut off (part of) their hair

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= wound, inflicted on oneself with a knife, ► as a sign of mourning

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= a coarse dark material ◄ made of goat or camel hair; ► worn next to the skin as a sign of mourning or repentance
= the structure forming the upper covering of a building, usually built as a terrace, to which one goes up by stairs
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

= mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include wailing (ילל) tearing one's clothes, putting on sackcloth (שַׂק) covering oneself with dust or ashes, fasting (צום) or eating specific food, cutting oneself (גדד) shaving one's head (קרח) covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to objects
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= state in which humans have lost most of their political strength ◄ as a result of defeat and death; ≈ associated with loss of status and with ridicule
= action by which humans utter a high pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
literally: (object of) laughter; hence: = a person or group who has to endure lack of respect from others, often accompanied by laughter
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to lack inner strength and courage

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle
= action by which a bird moves swiftly downwards ► in order to capture its prey; ≈ often used metaphorically to refer to an army attacking the enemy
= action by which humans or animals spread out part of their body
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security|= fortified city ◄ located in Moab (מֹואָב)

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a state in which humans experience extreme anxiety, ◄ as a result of difficult circumstances, as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

Node.gloss: to destroy|to exterminate|to wipe out|to demolish
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to make oneself great|to show one's greatness|to magnify oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities show others their elevated status, which they have, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד) ► former residence of Sihon (סִיחֹון) king of Amorites (אֱמֹרִי) (who had captured it from Moab (מֹואָב) assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) later occupied by Moab
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד) ► former residence of Sihon (סִיחֹון) king of Amorites (אֱמֹרִי) (who had captured it from Moab (מֹואָב) assigned to clan of Merari (מְרָרִי) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) later occupied by Moab
= hot glowing body of fire (אֵשׁ) ≈ poetic
= an area somewhere in the middle of a physical space
= man; ► king of Amorites (אֱמֹרִי) defeated by Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
as [a] but used independently: = side of the head between forehead and ear; ► the hair of which was not be shaved as was the practice of certain ethnic groups
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with feet (רֶגֶל) to refer to the whole physical body
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior

literally: roaring; hence: = process by which a political entity, like a nation or kingdom, is in a state of unrest, often meaning that they are contemplating rebellion or planning to wage war; ◄ described in terms of the sound produced by turbulent waters
exclamation expressing grief and dismay
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention
= deity; ► national deity of Moab (מֹואָב)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which people, animals or objects have been forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which people have been forcibly carried off into slavery or exile

Node.gloss: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
literally: end of days; hence: = a period of time in the future
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= action by which humans or deities carry out a verdict pronounced against an individual or group
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
